item.title: By: thomas
item.dc:creator: thomas
item.description: This eLiquid is a very refreshing. The lime flavor is spot on and gives you that sweet citrus flavor with the addition of a nice punch of cherry. Leaves a great taste in my mouth
item.content:encoded: This eLiquid is a very refreshing. The lime flavor is spot on and gives you that sweet citrus flavor with the addition of a nice punch of cherry. Leaves a great taste in my mouth

item.title: By: sheryl
item.dc:creator: sheryl
item.description: It was the best cherry limeade i have ever had
item.content:encoded: It was the best cherry limeade i have ever had

item.title: By: Robb marshall
item.dc:creator: Robb marshall
item.description: Speechless. Absolutely amazing! My compliments to the chef.
item.content:encoded: Speechless. Absolutely amazing! My compliments to the chef.
